jSCEP uses the following software:

== Build Process ==

  * [http://www.eclipse.org/ Eclipse] for Development
  * [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven] for Building
  * [http://www.junit.org/ JUnit] for Unit Testing
  * [http://easymock.org/ EasyMock] for Unit Testing
  * [http://www.eclipse.org/jetty/ Jetty] for System Testing
  * [http://cobertura.sourceforge.net/ Cobertura] for Code Coverage

== Dependencies ==

  * [http://www.bouncycastle.org/ Bouncy Castle] for Cryptography
  * [http://commons.apache.org/codec/ Apache Commons Codec] for Base64 and Hex Encoding
